headline.main: Keeping Tabs on Our Kids' Weight

docs.abstract: Letters from Daniel J Hoffman, Julie E Dunn, Linda Bloom, Joe Lawrence, MaryAnn Gorman and Margaret H Rand respond to Jan 8 article about controversy over schools that report students' body mass scores to parents, but serve fries in their cafeterias; drawing
docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''As Obesity Fight Hits Cafeteria, Many Fear a Note From School'' (front page, Jan. 8):
docs.snippet: To the Editor:     Re ''As Obesity Fight Hits Cafeteria, Many Fear a Note From School'' (front page, Jan. 8):
